aspguidp.service.core.asp

Interface SolverMessageManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DlvSolverMessageManager

    public interface SolverMessageManager
    Interface for a solver message manager.

    A solver message manager is responsible for extracting messages from the output of a logic program solver. The message manager only extracts output of the logic program solver, which is not an answer set. Therefore, a solver message manager is used to extract warnings or errors from the output of a logic program solver.

    An instance of a solver message manager is passed to an AspSolverService instance, when the logic program of the solver service is executed. The solver message manager instance provides a observable property which is set to the messages from the logic program solver after execution.

    Usually, only one solver message manager instance is used in the application.

    • Method Detail

      • setPropertiesBySolverOutput

        void setPropertiesBySolverOutput(java.lang.String solverOutput)
        Extract the logic program solver messages from the given solver output and set it to the observable property of the solver message manager instance. This method is called by the answer set programming solver service with the output of the solver after the execution of the logic program.
        Parameters:
        solverOutput - output of the executed logic program solver

      • solverMessageProperty

        javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyStringProperty solverMessageProperty()
